FlowDefinition.description:
Pop Up Sample Flow of how to use the Address Picker Autocomplete for Flow component. Screen 1 - contains the component. Screen 2 - shows ways to output the result
Map, Address Fields, and County are active with a Default Value for Longitude and Latitude at Salesforce Tower, San Francisco. Output variables are set as Input as well so going 'Back' will keep data.
FlowDefinition.masterLabel: Sample Address Picker Flow PopUp from URL
